meanings.definition: To build again or repair something that has been damaged or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the community rebuilds their homes.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter rebuilds the broken chair with new wood.
meanings.sent3: The magical fairy rebuilds the toy castle with a wave of her wand.
meanings.sent4: Hope rebuilds the shattered dreams into a brighter future.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he rebuilds his life from the ground up.

meanings.definition: The act of rebuilding or repairing something.
meanings.sent1: The rebuilds of the city after the earthquake took years.
meanings.sent2: The rebuilds of the old bridge brought new life to the town.
meanings.sent3: The rebuilds of the robot factory made the robots dance better.
meanings.sent4: The rebuilds of trust between friends is like mending a broken vase.
meanings.sent5: The rebuilds of the ancient ruins revealed hidden treasures.
